name: The Osteopathic Centre Siglap, East Coast

reviews.text: I have been experiencing lower back pain with limited mobility; Iqra provides a more holistic approach in terms of pain management & pain treatment. She has a wealth of experience and knowledge, and her friendly and caring manner is a bonus. I would highly recommend this clinic, and Iqra in particular!

[NOT A PAID REVIEW]
I had a slip disc last year, which led me to seek chiropractic care. Unfortunately, I experienced a distressing incident that left me unable to move my limbs for two days and resulted in a five-day hospital stay. It was an incredibly challenging time, and the pain became unbearable.

Feeling desperate, I even contemplated undergoing surgery, despite the risks (partial stroke or vegetate) involved. However, a kind-hearted individual suggested that I try osteopathic treatment as an alternative. Initially, I was hesitant and skeptical, but I decided to give it a chance. And I am so grateful that I did!

From the very first session with Iqra, I noticed a significant improvement in my nerve issues. The numbness that had plagued me for so long began to fade away. It was a relief beyond words to experience such positive changes after just one session.

As the days went by, I continued to get better, and I no longer need frequent massages every week. The osteopathic treatment has truly made a HUGE difference in my overall well-being.

I want to express my deepest gratitude to Iqra and the osteopathic approach for providing me with the relief and healing I desperately needed. It has been a life-changing experience, and I highly recommend their services to anyone seeking an alternative and effective solution for their nerve issues or musculoskeletal concerns.

Thank you, Iqra, for helping me regain my mobility and improving my quality of life. ü§çü•π

:) good place üòÑ
They help my tennis elbow:)

-5 Stars for customer service
-5 Stars for recovery and tips
It has been 1 month since my recovery. Previously, my elbow and shoulder hurt and I could not play tennis for a while. However, after a few check-ups and appointments here, I swiftly recovered and is now continuing my tennis training. I recommend this place to everyone.

Dr Paul Bell is an exceptional Osteopath. He is extremely knowledgable and experienced. You only need to go to him once to see a huge improvement. The Osteopathic Clinic is also very professional and everyone is friendly and helpful. Overall, always a great experience.

Highly recommend the Osteopathic Centre! I have seen therapists to treat both my children over the last two years.  Paul Bell has been treating my son (5months old) since birth. He is very understanding and reassuring, while providing an excellent service. Very impressed with the treatment and high quality care.
